locale: {locale, select, en {English} es {Spanish} de {German} hu {Hungarian} other {Unknown}}
title: Title
description-placeholder: Description (e.g. Gym membership for the month of June)
transaction-delete-description: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction? This action is irreversible and will permanently delete the transaction.
transaction-creating-success: Transaction added successfully. You can keep adding more transactions or go back to Home.
transaction-list-empty: You haven't added any transactions to this month yet
setting-currency: Set the default currency for all financial transactions.
setting-categories: Add, edit, or delete tags to organize your transactions better.
setting-delete-account: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
delete-account-description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible and all your data will be permanently removed.
monthly-summary: You had {income, plural, =1 {# income} other {# incomes}} and {expense, plural, =1 {# expense} other {# expenses}} this month
welcome-description: We're excited to have you on board. It looks like you're new here, and we can't wait to help you take control of your finances. With just a few simple steps, you'll set up your account and be on your way to better financial management.
setup-footer: Click the button below to start setting up your account.
setup-tooltip: Setup your account to get started.

monthly-budget.title: Monthly Budget
monthly-budget.description: Define your monthly budget for each category.

add-initial-balance.title: Add Initial Balance
add-initial-balance.description: Enter your current account balances to start tracking your net worth.

review-and-finish.title: Review and Finish
review-and-finish.description: Review your settings to make sure everything is correct.

tip.budget: Setting a budget can help you take control of your finances and achieve your financial goals more effectively.
tip.tracking: Tracking your expenses can help you identify spending patterns and areas where you can save money.
tip.statements: Regularly reviewing your financial statements can help you catch any errors or unauthorized transactions early.
tip.automating: Automating your savings by setting up automatic transfers can help you reach your savings goals faster.
tip.impulse: Avoiding impulse purchases by waiting 24 hours before making a non-essential purchase can help you make more mindful spending decisions.
tip.recurring: Reviewing and renegotiating your recurring bills, such as internet or insurance, can help you save money on monthly expenses.
tip.emergency: Building an emergency fund with three to six months' worth of living expenses can provide financial security during unexpected events.

landing.heading: Take Charge of Your Finances with Ease
landing.subheading: Keep track of expenses, manage budgets, and achieve your financial goals effortlessly with our all-in-one expense tracker.

login-continue: Log in to your account to continue
warning-description: This project is still being actively worked on and is not fully ready for production. Expect bugs and missing features.
